comments.en:
The Oki C5200 is a networked color laser printer with a 2006 street price of $399 USD. This printer is supported by the foo2hiperc open software printer driver.

Consumables/Refills: Toner Black (1500 prints) - $32 Toner Yellow (1500 prints) - $65 Toner Magenta (1500 prints) - $65 Toner Cyan (1500 prints) - $65 Drum Black (15000 prints) - $100 Drum Yellow (1500 prints) - $120 Drum Magenta (1500 prints) - $120 Drum Cyan (1500 prints) - $120 Part numbers: 43034804
